name: @legendapp/list
description: Legend List is a drop-in replacement for FlatList with much better performance and supporting dynamically sized items.

scripts.publish: bun run prep-changelog && bun run build && cd dist && npm publish && cd .. && bun run create-release.ts
scripts.publish:next: bun run build && cd dist && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish:beta: bun run build && cd dist && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.lint: bunx biome check ./src && bunx biome format ./src && bunx biome check ./__tests__ && bunx biome format ./__tests__ && bun run lint:example
scripts.lint:example: bunx biome check ./example/app && bunx biome format ./example/app
scripts.lint:fix: bunx biome lint --write ./src && bunx biome format --write ./src && bunx biome check --write ./src && bun run lint:fix:example
scripts.lint:fix:example: bunx biome lint --write ./example/app && bunx biome format --write ./example/app && bunx biome check --write ./example/app

author: Legend <contact@legendapp.com> (https://github.com/LegendApp)
